title: Empty Flattery
alternative_title: 鹤言虚语 ; Hè Yán Xū Yǔ ; Pretty Yet Empty Words
status: 鹤言虚语 ; Hè Yán Xū Yǔ ; Pretty Yet Empty Words
description:
Description :
        Yayu had long since forgotten how she had once fooled Mo Jiu into the palm of her hand. Yet, Mo Jiu still remembered their promise from that year with crytal clarity: "It's time for you to fulfill that promise!" Yayu thought, "Alright, how do I trick him again?" But just as she let her guard down, triggered by this forgotten promise, Yayu's deepest secret was exposed. Mo Jiu's 'Leopard Rage': "Meow, meow, meow!"
